Do you ever fear that your hopes
and dreams will remain just hopes and dreams?

Dear Friend,

Are you concerned that come the end of your life you've missed out on something?

That you never got the house, car, mate, family, recognition, travel, success, acceptance, or possessions you wanted?

Nursing homes are filled with people who never really lived, never maximized their potential, never went beyond being common.

Maybe you are dreaming of performing in Carnegie Hall ... writing a book ... climbing the Devil's Tower ... reading the World's Greatest Books ... snorkeling in the South Pacific ... running for public office ... starting a business ...

Fantastic! Do something for yourself today to bring your hopes and dreams into reality.

You can. You really can. Whether you are a student, adult, or senior.

Life is too short to wait a minute longer.

Introducing...

Clear Mind ~ Bright Future

A CD-ROM program to turn your hopes and dreams into realistic, absolutely attainable goals, targets that make sense for you as an unique and wonderful individual.

      guided visualizations
      creative brainstorming sessions
      the ancient "Master Formula of Attainment"
      inner mind conditioning and programming 



In just a couple of hours, international learning expert Paul Scheele will help you discover your guiding purpose in life, sort out what you really want, create a workable path, and get you going to actually realizing your hopes and dreams.

Note: this is not the typical goal setting program. This is fun, energizing, and motivating.

Even though most people don't like goal setting, I love it. Because when you write down goals, your brain automatically works toward bringing them to fruition. Goal setting = clarity = power.

BUT, some ways are quicker, faster, and easier than others ... and a joy, not a chore. That's the Clear Mind ~ Bright Future way.

* * * *
Here is how it works:
* * * *

All you need is a halfway decent Mac or PC. This CD-ROM learning program, designed by Paul and our team here at Learning Strategies, requires nothing more than a computer and a couple of uninterrupted hours. Make sure your speakers are turned on! .

You can do the course in modules or all at once. (We recommend doing it all at once.)

If you are not completely satisfied with your experience, you can request a full refund within 60 days.

Your inner world creates your outer world whether you want wealth, health, a new house, a better car, a promotion at work, new furniture ... it does not matter one bit.

Clear Mind ~ Bright Future focuses your energies and conditions your mind to bring into your outer world your hopes and dreams.
